name: The Usual
description:
The more beers you have, the worse it is - but try to get them all anyway!

This was my submission for the Ludum Dare 40 Compo challenge, where developers had to make a game in 48 hours. The theme was "The more you have, the worse it is." This was also my first time making a game in Unity by myself - so coding, art, music, voices, everything was done from scratch by yours truly :-)

The events depicted in this game are fictitious. Any similarity to any people living or dead is merely coincidental.
